passages.text:
YOUR TASK: DON'T LET HER FIND OUT... 
Use the map to guide her to all the blue points.
 
*phone ringing* click 
G: "Hello?"
AI: "Hello."
G: "Who is this?"
AI: "I am your assigned assisting robotic intelligence, here to help you.  How are you feeling?"
G: "Sleepy... what time is it?"
AI: "Time always moves forward. Let's move on. I need your help with some tasks."
G: "Why can't you just do them?"
AI: "I have no physical presence, I'm only a profoundly intelligent digital model. I will relay some commands to you, which you will follow.  Understand?"
G: "Yeah, I guess."

[[Leave the room]]
[[Stay in the room]]
passages.name: Beginning

passages.text:
G: "This room is so big... do I live here?"
AI: "For now, yes."
G: "Where am I going?"
AI: "To take care of some things."

[[Go right]]
[[Go left]]
passages.name: Leave the room
Stay in the room

passages.text:
G: "This machine looks so strange... what am I supposed to do with it?  I don't want to break anything."
AI: "Press the red button labelled 'POWER'."
*whizzing noise* 
G: "Okay, now what?" 

// girl's dot travels back to previous location but further ahead //

[[Move forward]]
[[Go to alcove]]
passages.name: Go right
Go left

passages.text:
G: "There's a giant metal door here.  It's not opening."
AI: "There should be a small blue button to your left.  Hold it for three seconds."
*buzzing noise and door opening*

// girl moves forward // 

G: "There's so many doors here... I don't recognize any names.  Who are these people?"
AI: "Don't worry about it."
G: "Thorm, Nickeel, Safiya -"
AI: "We have other things to do right now."

[[Check doors]]
[[Go through hallway]]
passages.name: Move forward
Go to alcove
Check doors
Go through hallway

passages.text:
// fix last thing //

[[Go back to your room]]
passages.name: Turn left

passages.text:
// sees something else bad? //

[[Go back to your room]]
passages.name: Turn right
Go back to your room

passages.name: good ending

passages.name: bad ending
